ModMetaData.name: Yakuza Combat Mastery
ModMetaData.author: AIvanCP
ModMetaData.description:
Master the legendary combat techniques of the Yakuza series in RimWorld!
Features: - **10 Reactive Combat Abilities** - Automatic counters, dodges, and special attacks - **Weapon-Specific Moves** - Each technique requires specific weapons or conditions - **Skill-Based Scaling** - Higher melee skill increases trigger chances - **Uncapped Skills** - Support for skills beyond level 20 - **Visual Effects** - Dust, sparks, flashes for each move - **No Instant Kills** - Lethal damage converts to downed state - **Player-Only Option** - Toggle whether enemies can use techniques
Combat Techniques: • Tiger Drop (Unarmed) - Counter with 2x damage + stun • Komaki Parry (Katana) - Negate damage and slash back • Mad Dog Dodge Slash (Knife) - Dodge and counter with bleeding • Komaki Knockback (Club/Baton) - Blunt counter with stagger • Majima Heat Spin (Surrounded) - AoE spin attack when outnumbered • Komaki Breakfall (Any weapon) - Recover from knockdowns instantly • Cat-Like Reflexes (Unarmed) - Dodge ranged attacks • Wall Crush (Blunt near wall) - Extended stun when near walls • Mad Dog Lunge (Knife) - Dash attack with bleed chance • Firearm Counter (Gun equipped) - Point-blank shot counter
These legendary techniques trigger automatically during combat based on your skill and situation. Master them all to become an unstoppable force!
